sub_topic: Identifying the type of inorganic solid (ionic, covalent, metallic)
message_1: Identify the type of inorganic solid that results from the ionic bonding between sodium and chlorine atoms.
message_2: The type of inorganic solid that results from the ionic bonding between sodium and chlorine atoms is a salt, specifically sodium chloride (NaCl). This compound is commonly known as table salt and has a crystalline structure.
